meanings.definition: Not having any serious purpose or value
meanings.sent1: The party was full of frivolous games and laughter.
meanings.sent2: She was criticized for her frivolous spending habits.
meanings.sent3: The frivolous puppy chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: His frivolous attitude towards work cost him his job.
meanings.sent5: The frivolous decision to skip studying led to a failed exam.

meanings.sent1: The children played in a frivolous manner, without a care in the world.
meanings.sent2: Her frivolous attitude towards life often brought smiles to those around her.
meanings.sent3: The frivolous butterfly flitted from flower to flower, enjoying the sunshine.
meanings.sent4: His frivolous jokes lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent5: The frivolous song made everyone dance without a worry.
